game.name: HyakuTyping
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: HyakuTyping is a typing software with a Roman alphabet input only theme based on the Hyakunin Isshu poems. You can play by looking at the display from the top and typing the lower verse, or by looking at the card with the lower verse and typing the first two characters of the upper verse.
game.shortDescriptionEn: HyakuTyping is a typing software with a Roman alphabet input only theme based on the Hyakunin Isshu poems. You can play by looking at the display from the top and typing the lower verse, or by looking at the card with the lower verse and typing the first two characters of the upper verse.
